venkatesh - (28/06/2009 13:14): sdumitriu: Hi  
sdumitriu - (28/06/2009 13:14): Hi  
venkatesh - (28/06/2009 13:14): I was thinking about a moveAttachment() xmlrpc function  
venkatesh - (28/06/2009 13:15): can I just do a addAttachment and removeAttachment()  
venkatesh - (28/06/2009 13:15): for the xmlrpc api implementation?  
sdumitriu - (28/06/2009 13:15): Hm...  
venkatesh - (28/06/2009 13:15): internally?  
venkatesh - (28/06/2009 13:15): is that clean?  
sdumitriu - (28/06/2009 13:15): What will happen to the attachment history?  
sdumitriu - (28/06/2009 13:16): It is clean, provided we find something for keeping the history, too  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 13:16  
venkatesh - (28/06/2009 13:17): yes, I think that can be done.

arunreddy\_ - (28/06/2009 14:43): sdumitriu : Hi  
arunreddy\_ - (28/06/2009 14:43): regarding: [Vote] Add String getCurrentSpace() to DocumentAccessBridge  
arunreddy\_ - (28/06/2009 14:43): are we coming up with new implementation.?  
sdumitriu - (28/06/2009 14:44): Yes  
arunreddy\_ - (28/06/2009 14:46): Even i need a few . To create documents on the fly. So am i supposed to wait for a while.?  
arunreddy\_ - (28/06/2009 14:47): Especially the metadata information.
